data.title: Sandpoint X3 Motherboard with Valis X2 MPC7455 PMC Module (discontinued version)
data.text:
The Valis X3 is the latest version of the PPCEVAL-SP3-7455. This page contains only the documentation and tools for the X2 version.

The Valis X2 MPC7455 PMC Module (Part No. PPCEVAL-SP3-7455) is a PCI Mezzanine Card (PMC) with the MPC7455 Host Processor option for the Sandpoint X3 motherboard.

The Sandpoint X3 Evaluation System demonstrates the capabilities of Motorola processors based on the implementation of the PowerPC instruction set architecture (ISA) and the Tundra Semiconductor Tsi107â„¢ host bridge.

The Sandpoint X3 Evaluation System is the ideal platform for software development and debug, as well as for hardware development.

Archived content is no longer updated and is made available for historical reference only.
